p: Active assessment of AEs will be done in all participants up to day 28. Passive assessment will continue during the follow-up period and will be reported. Each AE will follow a causality assessment. For this, the investigator will determine all contributing factors applicable to each event. These contributing factors will be documented and reported. Every effort will be made by the investigator to explain each AE/SAE and assess its causal relationship to administration of the study vaccine.
